Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product offers unparalleled value and efficiency, tailored specifically for users like yourself. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the quality it brings, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a competitive price. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our premium product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
